Title: Lucie Aubrac
Actors: Carole Bouquet, Daniel Auteuil, Patrice Chéreau, Eric Boucher
Plot: A love story or a tale of the resistance, this poignant movie tells both the haunting story of a French resistance cell in Lyon but also the love of Lucie Aubrac for her husband, and the ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 nominations.
